Name: Juba
Description: Juba is the capital and largest city of South Sudan, known as a political and economic hub, located on the banks of the White Nile.

Name: Malakal
Description: Malakal is a city in the Upper Nile state of South Sudan, located along the Sobat River, known for its strategic location and role as a market town.

Name: Wau
Description: Wau is a major city in the Bahr el Ghazal region of South Sudan, known for its agricultural activities and as a commercial center in the region.
